_meanings:
(As last member of
<ab>comp.</ab>) Producing, leading or
tending to, bringing on,  
{#kleSAvahA BarturalakzaRA'haM#} <ls>R. 14. 5</ls>; so
{#duHKa°, Baya°, kzaya°#} &c.

{@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of one
of the seven winds or bands of air,
usually assigned to the {#Buvarloka#} or
atmospheric region between the
{#BUrloka#} and {#svarloka#}.

{@--2@} One of the
seven tongues of fire.
